string.name: EM
string.br: Discrete Mathematics :Propositional and First Logic. Sets, relations, functions, partial orders and lattices , Monoids, Groups . Graphs : connectivity , matching , coloring . combinatorics : counting ,recurrence relations, generating functions.
......Linear Algebra: Matrices, determinants , system of linear equations, eigenvalues and eigenvectors, LU decomposition \n
Calculus: Limits, Continuity and differentiability . Maxima and minima , Mean value theorem integration.\n
Probability : Random variables. Uniform, normal , exponential , poisson and binomial distributions . Mean, median, mode and standard deviation.\n

string.name: DigitalLogic
string.br: \n Boolean algebra Combinational and Sequential circuit. Minimization. Number Representational and computer arithmetic(fixed and floating point).\n

string.name: coa
string.br: Machine Instructions and addressing modes. ALU, data- path and control unit. Instruction pipelining, pipelining hazards. Memory hierarchy . cache, main memory and secondary storage : I/O interface (interrupt and DMA mode).

string.name: ps
string.br: Programming in C:Recursion , Arrays , stacks, queues , linked list , tress, binary search trees, binary heaps , graphs.

br.b: Searching, sorting, hashing, Asymptotic worst case time and space complexity. greedy, dynamic programming and divide - and - conquer. Graph traversals, minimum spanning trees, shortest paths.\n

string.name: Theoryofcom
string.br: Regular expressions and finite automata. context - Free grammars and Push - down automata. Regular and context - free language, pumping lemma. Turing machines and undecidability\n

string.name: compilerDesign
string.br: Lexical analysis, parsing, syntax - directed transition. Runtime environments, Intermediate code generation. Local optimisation, Data flow analysis: constant propagation, liveness analysis, common subexpression elimination\n

string.name: operatingsystem
string.b: \n System calls, processes, threads , inter-process communication, concurrency , and synchronization. Deadlock , CPU and I/O scheduling , Memory management and virtual memory. file systems\n

string.name: Database
string.br: ER-model. Relational model : relation algebra , tuple calculus, SQL Integrity constraints , normal forms. File organization, Indexing (e.g B and B+ trees ) . Transactions and concurrency control.\n

string.name: computerNetworks
string.br: Concept of Layering : OSI and TCP/IP Protocol Stacks ; Basic of Packet, circuit and virtual circuit switching: Data link Layer: framing , error detection, Medium Access control , Ethernet bridging ; Routing protocols : shortest path , flooding distance vector and link state routing : Fragmentation and IP addressing , IPv4, CIDR notation, Basics of IP support protocols (ARP, DHCP, ICMP), Network Address Translation (NAT) ; Transport layer; flow control and congestion control, UDP, TCP, sockets, Application layer protocols ; DNS, SMTP, HTTP, FTP, Email.
